summary: A street-smart pool player falls in with a pack of hustlers. As he rises in the underground circuit, he lands in the middle of a match between his boss and a crooked cop.
cast: Ving Rhames|Roselyn Sanchez|Daniel Newman|Freddie Prinze Jr.|Callum Keith Rennie|Angus Macfadyen|Devon Sawa|Dan Bell|Jon Eyez|Mark Krasnoff|Robert Pralgo|Leicester Landon|Jeffrey Huth|Bill Romanowski|Phi-Long Nguyen|Charles Bruno|Nick Gomez|Glenn Robin|Michael Arata|Whit Washing|Mark Adam|Dane Rhodes|Jim Harley|Stormy Shuff|Michael Wayne LeBlanc|Avery White|Rodney Ford|Kathleen LaGue|Gabrielle Shuff|John J. title: El arte de la venganza
